Question: Shunde Kingtec Appliance Co.,Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Shunde Kingtec Appliance Co.,Ltd

Product: BESPOKE 4-Door Flex™ Refrigerator with AI Family Hub™+

- AI Vision Inside feature provides a comprehensive list of fridge contents, expiration dates, and sends notifications for expiring items
- Enhanced AI capabilities for smart food management and recipe suggestions
- Interconnectivity with other BESPOKE appliances for multitasking and convenience
- BESPOKE Jet Bot AI Combo™ with steam cleaning and AI Object Recognition for efficient cleaning
- AI OptiWash™ and AI Optimal Dry features in BESPOKE AI™ Washer and Dryer Combo for effective laundry
- Anyplace Induction Cooktop with AI Cook Manager technology for safe and hassle-free cooking
- 32-inch screen of BESPOKE 4-Door Flex™ Refrigerator with AI Family Hub™+ for content viewing and voice command recipe search
- AI Energy Mode for effortless energy savings and sustainability efforts.
